author: rharrison
title: Great clock for a young girl
review:
The note on the box says "Images on pack may not reflect contents" - too true!  This set was made under license for the Lego Group by chinese company Clic Time Ltd and mine opened from "new" ("QC PASSED" stickers) had the following part discrepancies:

  • Yellow cones instead of white
  • White flag instead of pink
  • Extra jewel
  • 2 missing 2x2 pink bricks

Still looks the part though.  A great variation on a clock for a young girl.
